sections.title: Overview
sections.content: 01 Overview Built a full-stack platform to streamline operations for a 7-location service organization, replacing manual paper-based workflows with automated digital processes. The system provides real-time visibility, automated CRM integration, GPS tracking, and team communication.

sections.title: Problem & Solution
sections.content: 02 Problem & Solution Challenge Manual data entry, no cross-location visibility, poor lead tracking, and disconnected teams across 90 miles. Solution Mobile-first platform with real-time dashboard, automated CRM sync, live GPS tracking, and integrated communication - eliminating double entry and enabling instant operational coordination.

sections.title: My Role
sections.content: 03 My Role Full-Stack Developer (Solo) Architected and developed complete system: backend API, frontend app, and database Implemented CRM integration with retry logic and error handling Built real-time features using WebSockets for live updates Deployed production system with CI/CD pipelines

sections.title: Architecture
sections.content: 04 Architecture System Architecture ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ Next.js 14 Frontend (Vercel) │ │ React + TypeScript + TailwindCSS + Radix UI │ │ Real-time Subscriptions │ └──────────────────┬──────────────────────────────────┘ │ REST API + WebSocket ┌──────────────────┴──────────────────────────────────┐ │ FastAPI Backend (Render) │ │ Python + JWT Auth + RBAC + Background Jobs │ └──────┬──────────────────┬──────────────┬──────────--┘ │ │ │ ┌──────┴───────┐ ┌───────┴──────┐ ┌───┴──────┐ │ PostgreSQL │ │ Redis │ │ External │ │ (Supabase) │ │ (Cache/Jobs) │ │ CRM API │ └──────────────┘ └──────────────┘ └──────────┘ Integrations: Google Maps • Firebase • SendGrid

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: 05 Key Features Real-Time Dashboard Live operational metrics with WebSocket updates Multi-location filtering and date ranges Mobile-responsive widget interface Lead Management Digital intake forms with duplicate detection Automated CRM sync with retry logic Follow-up reminders and conversion tracking GPS Tracking 30-second location updates Live ETA with Google Maps traffic data Shareable tracking links for stakeholders Team Communication Multi-channel chat with @mentions Real-time notifications Message search and pinning User Management Role-based access control (5 levels) Location-based permissions Activity audit logging Mobile PWA Installable on iOS/Android Push notifications Offline functionality

sections.title: Tech Stack
sections.content: 06 Tech Stack Frontend Next.js 14 TypeScript React 18 TailwindCSS Radix UI TanStack Query React Hook Form Zod Backend Python 3.11 FastAPI SQLAlchemy Pydantic Celery Redis WebSockets Database & Infrastructure PostgreSQL Supabase Vercel Render Integrations Google Maps API Firebase Cloud Messaging SendGrid Enterprise CRM REST API

sections.title: Technical Highlights
sections.content: 07 Technical Highlights End-to-end type safety (TypeScript + Pydantic) Real-time WebSocket architecture JWT authentication with RBAC Background job processing with retry logic RESTful API with OpenAPI documentation Responsive PWA with offline support Strategic database indexing for performance CI/CD pipelines with automated deployment Built with modern technologies and best practices for production-ready enterprise software. This is a private production application - detailed demonstrations available upon request.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: 01 Overview Built a full-stack AI platform that analyzes customer behavior, detects psychological friction points, and provides strategic recommendations for revenue optimization. The system combines neuroscience principles, behavioral tracking, and competitive intelligence to decode subconscious buying behavior and simulate business strategies in real-time.

sections.title: Problem & Solution
sections.content: 02 Problem & Solution Challenge Organizations struggle to understand why visitors don't convert, lack insight into psychological barriers, and make strategic decisions without comprehensive competitive intelligence or behavioral data. Solution AI-driven platform that tracks digital body language, identifies friction points, provides psychological insights, and simulates strategic scenarios - enabling data-driven revenue optimization with real-time behavioral intelligence.

sections.title: My Role
sections.content: 03 My Role Full-Stack AI Developer (Solo) Architected and developed complete AI intelligence system: backend API, frontend dashboard, and ML pipelines Implemented behavioral analysis engine with psychological profiling capabilities Built competitive intelligence system with automated data collection and analysis Deployed production-ready platform with advanced AI integration and real-time processing

sections.title: Architecture
sections.content: 04 Architecture ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ React/Vite Frontend (Vercel) │ │ TypeScript + TailwindCSS + Advanced Analytics │ │ Real-time AI Dashboards │ └──────────────────┬─────────────────────────────────┘ │ REST API + WebSocket + AI Layer ┌──────────────────┴─────────────────────────────────┐ │ FastAPI Backend (Render) │ │ Python + AI Services + Celery Workers │ └─────┬─────────────────┬──────────────┬─────────────┘ │ │ │ ┌─────┴──────┐ ┌───────┴──────┐ ┌───-┴────────┐ │ PostgreSQL │ │ Redis │ │ AI Services │ │ (Supabase) │ │ (Cache/Jobs) │ │ GPT-4/Claude│ └────────────┘ └──────────────┘ └─────────────┘ AI Layer: OpenAI GPT-4 • Anthropic Claude • Behavioral ML

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: 05 Key Features AI Behavioral Intelligence Digital body language tracking with psychological analysis Real-time friction point detection across customer journey Neuromind profile assignment based on behavioral patterns Conversion barrier identification with psychological insights Business Intelligence Engine Competitive analysis with automated data collection SWOT analysis generation with AI-powered insights Market positioning analysis and strategic recommendations Revenue leak detection and optimization suggestions Strategic Simulation Sandbox Interactive business canvas with scenario modeling A/B test planning with statistical significance calculations Revenue impact predictions for strategic changes Visual influence mapping of customer touchpoints AI Strategist Agent Multi-step reasoning with visual response generation Proactive optimization recommendations Real-time competitive monitoring and alerts Daily intelligence briefings with priority actions Advanced Analytics Dashboard Six specialized intelligence modules Real-time behavioral signal processing Cross-platform attribution tracking Predictive performance modeling

sections.title: Tech Stack
sections.content: 06 Tech Stack Frontend React 18, TypeScript, Vite TailwindCSS, Headless UI Zustand, TanStack Query, React Hook Form Backend Python 3.11, FastAPI SQLAlchemy, Pydantic Celery, Redis, WebSockets AI & Analytics OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude Custom behavioral analysis algorithms Statistical modeling and prediction engines Computer vision for competitive analysis Database & Infrastructure PostgreSQL (Supabase) Redis for caching and job queues Vercel (frontend), Render (backend) Sentry for monitoring Integrations Facebook/Google Ads APIs HubSpot/GoHighLevel CRM Stripe payment processing Web scraping and competitive intelligence

sections.title: Technical Highlights
sections.content: 07 Technical Highlights Multi-modal AI integration with custom psychological analysis algorithms Real-time behavioral tracking with WebSocket-powered analytics Advanced statistical modeling for A/B test planning and revenue predictions Microservices architecture with 25+ database models and 11+ core services Computer vision integration for competitive creative analysis Event-driven architecture with Celery for background processing Comprehensive API with OpenAPI documentation and type safety Production deployment with CI/CD and comprehensive monitoring Built with cutting-edge AI and modern technologies for enterprise-grade revenue intelligence. This is a private production application - detailed demonstrations available upon request.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: 01 Overview Built a full-stack platform that analyzes and optimizes web pages for visibility in generative AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI, Bing Chat). The system audits websites, identifies optimization opportunities, and generates improved versions with enhanced structured data and AI-readable content formatting.

sections.title: Problem & Solution
sections.content: 02 Problem & Solution Challenge Traditional SEO doesn't optimize for AI-powered search engines. Websites need structured data, enhanced content formatting, and specific technical optimizations to be properly understood and cited by generative AI systems. Solution Automated platform that scrapes web pages, analyzes content structure, detects optimization gaps, and generates comprehensive improvements including schema markup, meta optimization, and AI-friendly content restructuring - all while preserving backlinks to original content.

sections.title: My Role
sections.content: 03 My Role Full-Stack Developer (Solo) Architected and developed complete system: FastAPI backend, React frontend, and multi-service analysis engine Implemented 12+ specialized analyzers for content, schema, technical SEO, and media optimization Built AI-powered content optimization using GPT-4 for semantic analysis and enhancement Deployed production system with database persistence and session replay functionality

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: 05 Key Features Multi-Layer Web Scraping Traditional HTML parsing with BeautifulSoup Headless browser rendering for SPA/JavaScript apps Intelligent content extraction from React/Angular/Vue applications Media and metadata analysis Comprehensive Content Analysis Content structure and readability scoring FAQ detection and generation Citation and authority signal analysis E-E-A-T (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trust) evaluation Heading hierarchy and text density assessment Schema Markup Generation Automated JSON-LD structured data generation FAQ, Article, HowTo, Organization schema types Validation and conflict detection AI-optimized schema formatting Technical SEO Analysis Meta tag optimization for AI consumption Robots.txt and sitemap validation Crawlability assessment AI crawler compatibility checks llms.txt generation (AI-specific sitemap) AI-Powered Optimization GPT-4 semantic content analysis Automated content enhancement suggestions Question-focused title generation AI-friendly content restructuring Contextual Intelligence Internal link crawling for business context Multi-page analysis for comprehensive optimization Cross-service data consolidation Real business information extraction Session Persistence Database storage of all analyses Session replay functionality Historical optimization tracking Export functionality for optimized pages

sections.title: Tech Stack
sections.content: 06 Tech Stack Frontend React 18, JavaScript ES6+ TailwindCSS, Modern UI Components Axios for API communication Backend Python 3.11, FastAPI SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL Pydantic schemas Async/await architecture Web Scraping & Analysis BeautifulSoup4 (HTML parsing) Headless browser rendering Custom content extractors AI & LLM Integration OpenAI GPT-4 API Custom prompt engineering Rate limiting and retry logic LLM input optimization Database & Infrastructure PostgreSQL (Supabase) Vercel (frontend hosting) Render (backend hosting)

sections.title: Technical Highlights
sections.content: 07 Technical Highlights Microservices architecture with 12+ specialized analyzers Async request processing for optimal performance Comprehensive error handling and retry mechanisms Advanced SPA detection and optimization Multi-layer scraping fallback strategy Structured data validation and conflict resolution Session persistence with database integration RESTful API with comprehensive documentation Rate-limited LLM integration for cost optimization Debug logging and session replay for troubleshooting Built with modern AI technologies and best practices for next-generation search optimization. This is a private production application - detailed demonstrations available upon request.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: 01 Overview Built a full-stack platform that generates personalized audio content through AI-driven conversations. The system uses natural language processing to understand user goals, generates customized content, converts text to high-quality speech, applies audio effects, and delivers professional audio files - all through an intuitive conversational interface.

sections.title: Problem & Solution
sections.content: 02 Problem & Solution Challenge Users need personalized content creation but face barriers with traditional text-based tools and lack audio production expertise. Solution Conversational AI chatbot that guides users through content generation, automatically produces professional audio with effects, and handles payment processing - eliminating technical barriers and manual audio production work.

sections.title: My Role
sections.content: 03 My Role Full-Stack Developer (Solo) Architected and developed complete system: backend API, frontend app, and processing pipeline Integrated multiple AI services (GPT-4, ElevenLabs TTS) with error handling Built asynchronous job processing for long-running audio generation tasks Implemented payment flow with Stripe and automated delivery system

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: 05 Key Features Conversational AI Interface Multi-turn dialogue to understand user needs Context-aware responses and follow-up questions Dynamic content generation based on conversation Text-to-Speech Generation High-quality neural voice synthesis Configurable voice settings and styles Preview and full-length audio generation Audio Post-Processing Automated audio effects application Background music integration Professional mixing and mastering FFmpeg-based audio manipulation Asynchronous Job Processing Background task queue with Redis + RQ Real-time job status tracking Resilient error handling and retries Payment Integration Stripe checkout flow Webhook-based payment verification Automated content delivery after purchase Cloud Storage & Delivery S3 bucket management with lifecycle policies Secure file uploads and downloads Pre-signed URLs for controlled access

sections.title: Tech Stack
sections.content: 06 Tech Stack Frontend React 17, JavaScript React Router, Axios Custom audio player component Backend Python 3.11, Flask 3.0 Redis Queue (RQ) for background jobs Gunicorn with gevent workers Audio Processing FFmpeg, Pydub AudioStretchy ElevenLabs API AI & Integrations OpenAI GPT-4 ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech Stripe Payments SendGrid Email AWS S3 Infrastructure Vercel (frontend hosting) Render (backend + worker services) AWS S3 (file storage) Redis (job queue)

sections.title: Technical Highlights
sections.content: 07 Technical Highlights Multi-turn conversational AI with context management Asynchronous background job processing for long-running tasks Audio processing pipeline with multiple effects and mixing RESTful API with CORS configuration Webhook handling for payment processing Scalable worker architecture for parallel job processing Cloud storage integration with secure file handling Error handling and retry logic for external API calls Built with modern AI technologies and production-ready architecture for scalable audio content generation. This is a private production application - detailed demonstrations available upon request.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: 01 Overview Built a full-stack health assessment platform that analyzes questionnaire responses and blood test documents to generate personalized supplement recommendations. The system uses AI to extract and interpret medical data, providing tailored health protocols with automated CRM integration.

sections.title: Problem & Solution
sections.content: 02 Problem & Solution Challenge Manual blood test interpretation, no personalized supplement recommendations, and disconnected customer journey from assessment to results delivery. Solution AI-driven platform with OCR blood test processing, GPT-4 analysis for personalized recommendations, automated report generation, and seamless CRM integration - transforming health data into actionable insights.

sections.title: My Role
sections.content: 03 My Role Full-Stack Developer (Solo) Architected complete system: Next.js frontend, FastAPI backend, and PostgreSQL database Implemented AI-powered blood test analysis using Google Vision API and GPT-4 Built automated supplement recommendation engine with 300+ interventions database Integrated CRM webhooks and magic link authentication system

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: 05 Key Features Health Assessment Flow Multi-step questionnaire with 50+ health markers Dynamic form validation and progress tracking Personalized supplement stack generation based on responses AI Blood Test Analysis OCR processing of PDF and image documents GPT-4 powered marker extraction and standardization Support for 100+ blood markers across multiple panels Automated result validation and error handling Supplement Recommendation Engine Database of 300+ evidence-based interventions Threshold-based prescription logic Dosage calculations and contraindication checks Printable PDF reports with detailed protocols Admin Dashboard Real-time submission tracking Magic link generation for results access User management and analytics Blood test status monitoring CRM Integration Webhook-based data synchronization Automated contact creation and updates Magic link delivery via email Custom field mapping Authentication Magic link passwordless authentication Secure token-based sessions Role-based access control Admin route protection

sections.title: Tech Stack
sections.content: 06 Tech Stack Frontend Next.js 15, TypeScript, React 19 TailwindCSS, Radix UI React Hook Form, Zod validation Backend (Blood Test API) Python 3.11, FastAPI Google Vision API (OCR) OpenAI GPT-4o (AI analysis) Pydantic validation Database & Infrastructure PostgreSQL (Supabase) Vercel (frontend hosting) Render (backend hosting) Integrations Google Cloud Vision API OpenAI API GoHighLevel CRM SendGrid (email delivery)

sections.title: Technical Highlights
sections.content: 07 Technical Highlights AI-powered document processing with OCR and LLM analysis End-to-end type safety (TypeScript + Pydantic) Async webhook architecture for blood test processing Database-driven recommendation engine with 300+ interventions RESTful API with comprehensive error handling Rate limiting and API key authentication Responsive mobile-first design Automated PDF report generation Magic link authentication system Built with modern AI technologies and best practices for healthcare data processing. This is a private production application - detailed demonstrations available upon request.
